strongs_def: blood, literally (of men or animals), figuratively (the juice of grapes) or specially (the atoning blood of Christ); by implication, bloodshed, also kindred
outline:
1. blood
    1. of man or animals
    2. refers to the seat of life
    3. of those things that resemble blood, grape juice
  2. blood shed, to be shed by violence, slay, murder
